<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=5844) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You have an enemy [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). 

</column>

---

You thrash your foe around. An enemy you have [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier plus your weapon specialization damage plus your [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802) damage, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save against your class DC.

<title level="2">Thrash leads to...</title>
[Collateral Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=5867)
name: Thrash
requirement: You have an enemy  grabbed  or  restrained .
